name: Tactical Advantage
ability: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
ability_html: Order: Boost an allied unit by 5.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Remember, cadets! He who first draws his blade has the advantage over his foe!

name: Geralt of Rivia
ability: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
ability_html: Deploy: Destroy an enemy unit with 9 or more power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.

name: Summoning Circle
ability:
Resilience.
Deploy: Look at the units in your deck in order from top to bottom, then choose a unit from your deck and set the Counter equal to that unit's provision cost.
Before the end of your turn, remove a Counter from self for each adjacent unit. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon the chosen unit from your deck to this row and destroy self.
ability_html: Resilience. Deploy: Look at the units in your deck in order from top to bottom, then choose a unit from your deck and set the Counter equal to that unit's provision cost. Before the end of your turn, remove a Counter from self for each adjacent unit. When the Counter reaches 0, Summon the chosen unit from your deck to this row and destroy self.
keyword_html: Resilience: Status that allows a unit to remain on the battlefield at the end of the round, then disappears.\nNote: Boost and Armor are not carried over to the next round. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: There exist a great many realities outside our own… With the right knowledge, one can contact them and summon beings beyond human fathoming.

name: Surrender
ability: Remove 2 Armor from all units on a row and damage them by 2.
ability_html: Remove 2 Armor from all units on a row and damage them by 2.
keyword_html: Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
flavor: There's no shame in waving the white flag.

name: Dorregaray of Vole
ability_html: Deploy: Lock a unit.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Lock: Status that disables a unit's abilities.
flavor: Like the witchers, Dorregaray is a monster aficionado, though he's developed his own classification system. Instead of dividing them into necrophages, ogroids and the like, he just thinks they're all wonderful.

name: Lacerate
ability: Damage all units on a row by 2.
ability_html: Damage all units on a row by 2.
flavor: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.

name: Alzur's Thunder
flavor: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.

name: Thunderbolt
ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by 3. Order: Boost an allied unit by 3.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.

name: Elder Bear
flavor: We're going on a bear hunt! We're going to catch a–– THAT THING'S HUGE! RUN!
